description:
Thanks to Veronica, our first Polish model to try the machines, we are introduced to the playful and undeniably sexy, Sandra.
Sandra goes from looking at the lens in a raw, curious manner to forgetting we are in the room and as her pussy relaxes she starts taking the dicks faster and deeper until she is completely spent. She starts with the gentle Mini-Mite – working the machine slow and fast, and she giggles when she gets the Mini-Mite all the way up. She looks at you and says in her thick Polish accent “Max”! Priceless! There is something almost hypnotic about how hot and genuine Sandra is in front of the camera. In the end interview she confesses to loving the Fucksall best of all, and then asks if that is okay! Yes, Sandra, loving machine orgasms is just fine with us!
If you missed her, go back to early this month for the Polish trip debut of the beautiful Veronica who christens the machines for us in the Eastern Block.
This update is in HD wide screen format with downloadables at 927kbps
title: Sandra
